amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part A of House Report 117-420 as en bloc No. 7: Nos. 104, 106, 107, 113, 115, 116, 123, 125, 136, 141, 142, 152, 153, 155, 156, 158, 159, 161, 164, 172, 174, 180, 181, 182, 186, 187, 188, 189, and 190.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendments (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 355 - 56 (Roll no. 379).
